segments.text: I see the boy stretching up to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's really brave to climb up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems to have a plan, using the plate to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit excited for him, hoping he gets his treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's done this before, climbing up to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching his limits to get what he wants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to be really proud if he succeeds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish him the best of luck in his cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
